content: This growth is going to come from our phone ARPU improvements, as we progress through our 5G monetization strategy and roaming recovery; improving B2B trends from scaling our IoT business, driving product intensity nationally; and offering the best digital solutions to businesses of all sizes; ongoing efficiency benefits from multiple programs, including our copper-to-fiber program and ongoing digitization efforts; continued subscriber growth as we expand our broadband coverage and more -- for more communities, as our accelerated spend continues on capital and we continue to drive more product intensity; and lastly, the integration of our M&A activities to drive more efficiency and effectiveness.
